Literature.Title: Entianin, a novel subtilin-like lantibiotic from Bacillus subtilis subsp. spizizenii DSM 15029T with high antimicrobial activity
Literature.Author: Fuchs SW, Jaskolla TW, Bochmann S, Kötter P, Wichelhaus T, Karas M, Stein T, Entian KD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51299(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=4-8µg/ml)
